title: B3-4 ADC main LF Duo partner
body:
Hey all,

Looking for someone over the age of 18 to duo with me, im an ADC main, jg is my offrole. Im chill, rarely get tilted and am never toxic in chat. Looking for a solid Support main who knows how to play support and someone who doesn't rage or tilt after bad games. Mic and discord is a must. Add me and we can chat! 

Cheers,

Syn

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ItsInflux,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=OeavoEbU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-23T04:22:20.435+0000)
>
> Hey man, I'm a support main who plays {{champion:412}} and {{champion:201}} mostly. I use Discord and I rarely go on tilt. Currently Bronze 1. Here's my op.gg where you can check my stats if you want :
>  https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ItsInflux
> On a bit of a loss streak, looking to break it.
> If you are down to play I'll add you and we can duo. Cheers bro :)

Hi mate got your add and am willing to give you a shot, as long as your over 18 (Or close)! Hope to chat with you soon!

Cheers,

Syn

> [{quoted}](name=surferfijio,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=OeavoEbU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-22T12:48:08.076+0000)
>
> http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/m0rEUBhx-bronze-bimbos-if-youre-looking-flex-buddies-join-our-discord

If you read the title, im not looking to play flex, im looking for a duo.
